pages.text: So, seasons are now a thing. A year is made up of four seasons- Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter and each season has three sub-seasons. Each sub-season lasts for two weeks.  $(br) During Summer, in temperate biomes, it tends to get really warm. At Winter, snow will fall and water will freeze.

Planting crops is also affected by seasons. Each crop will have a fertile season or seasons. This means, that the crop will only grow during those seasons. It is also possible to construct a greenhouse, using special glass, which will help you to grow crops all-year round.
